name: SpaceCommand (TigerJ)
description:
SPACE COMMAND

You are in command of a quadrant of space stations.
You must use your command center to defend against bad space junk (red cubes) and collect space resources (blue cubes). Simple right?

controls:

Joystick / Direction Buttons - Choose base to defend

Fire button - fire bullet capsule

Hey, post some scores and comments for me :)

Music was made by Mr. Joshua McLean
"Forest of the King" used in the title
"Contemplative Breaks" used in the game

http://mrjoshuamclean.com/royalty-free-music/
